revision.text:
'''Mark Harris''' may refer to:
*[[Mark Harris (American football)]] (born 1970), American professional football player *[[Mark Harris (author)]] (1922–2007), American writer of the baseball novel ''Bang the Drum Slowly'' *[[Mark Harris (bodybuilder)]], Welsh professional bodybuilder *[[Mark Harris (English footballer)]] (born 1963), English association football player *[[Mark Harris (Idaho politician)]], Idaho State Senator since 2015 *[[Mark Harris (jazz musician)]], Australian jazz musician and creator/member of band Lah-Lah *[[Mark Harris (journalist)]] (born 1964), American columnist and former editor at ''Entertainment Weekly'' magazine *[[Mark Harris (Maine politician)]] (1779–1843), United States Representative from Maine *[[Mark Harris (North Carolina politician)]] (born 1966), American pastor and politician *[[Mark Harris (musician)]] (born 1962), American Contemporary Christian musician *[[Mark Harris (pop musician)]] (born 1955), American musician and composer *[[Mark Harris (programmer)]], American computer graphics researcher *[[Mark Harris (rower)]], British rower at the [[1976 World Rowing Championships]] *[[Mark Harris (rugby league)]] (born 1947), Australian rugby league footballer *[[Mark Harris (softballer)]] (born 1985), Australian softball player *[[Mark Harris (Welsh footballer)]] (born 1998), Welsh association football player *[[Mark Jonathan Harris]] (born 1941), American documentary filmmaker
==Fiction== *Mark Harris, a fictional character in the American TV series ''[[Man from Atlantis]]''
==See also== *[[Marc Harris]], Panamanian accountant *[[Marcus Harris (disambiguation)]]
{{Hndis|Harris, Mark}}
